execution_plan.description: Get the distinct product_ids that have been sold (referenced in order items).
Map sold product_ids to their parent product ids (a sold variant counts as its parent kind).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT COALESCE(parent_product_id, product_id) AS sold_parent_id FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);

execution_plan.description: Return all top-level product kinds (products with parent_product_id IS NULL) that are not present in the sold parent ids â€” these are product kinds that have not been sold.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE parent_product_id IS NULL AND product_id NOT IN ($step2.sold_parent_id);
